DOC.brief_title: Dose-finding Trial HCD122 Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL ) That Relapsed Non-responsive Prior Fludaribine Therapy
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis CLL require treatment Refractory relapse disease Prior treatment fludarabine Male Female > 18 year age Treatment rituximab within 90 day alemtuzumab monoclonal antibody within 6 month .
